ComicInfo.Summary: Warren Ellis's hot new maxiseries continues! There are 1001 people on the Global Frequency, and Lana Kennedy is one of them. She has thirty minutes to stop Alphabet City, in the borough of Manhattan, the heart of New York City, from becoming ground zero for an alien virus' invasion. To do that she must use all her intelligence, skill, creativity, and, maybe most importantly, empathy. But will it be enough when the blood starts running?
ComicInfo.Title: Big Wheel
